name: @iiatlas/hledger-mcp
description: Interact with your HLedger accounting journals.
long_description: Double entry plain text accounting, right in your LLM! This MCP enables comprehensive read, and (optional) write access to your local HLedger accounting journals.

tools.name: hledger_accounts
tools.description: List account names from the journal

tools.name: hledger_balance
tools.description: Show account balances, balance changes, or other balance-related reports

tools.name: hledger_print
tools.description: Print full transactions from the journal

tools.name: hledger_find_entry
tools.description: Find complete journal entries matching a query

tools.name: hledger_register
tools.description: Show postings with running totals

tools.name: hledger_balancesheet
tools.description: Summarize assets and liabilities with balance sheet layout

tools.name: hledger_balancesheetequity
tools.description: Balance sheet including equity accounts

tools.name: hledger_incomestatement
tools.description: Income statement summarizing revenues and expenses

tools.name: hledger_cashflow
tools.description: Cash flow statement showing liquidity changes

tools.name: hledger_payees
tools.description: List payee names from the journal

tools.name: hledger_descriptions
tools.description: List transaction descriptions from the journal

tools.name: hledger_tags
tools.description: List tag names used in transactions

tools.name: hledger_files
tools.description: List data files in use by hledger

tools.name: hledger_stats
tools.description: Show journal statistics and health metrics

tools.name: hledger_activity
tools.description: Show posting activity counts as a bar chart

tools.name: hledger_notes
tools.description: List unique transaction notes

tools.name: hledger_remove_entry
tools.description: Remove a complete journal entry by exact match

tools.name: hledger_replace_entry
tools.description: Replace a complete journal entry with new content

tools.name: hledger_web
tools.description: Start the hledger web interface without blocking the MCP server

tools.name: hledger_web_list
tools.description: List running hledger web server instances

tools.name: hledger_web_stop
tools.description: Stop one or more hledger web server instances

tools.name: hledger_add_transaction
tools.description: Add a new transaction to the journal file

tools.name: hledger_import
tools.description: Import transactions from external data files

tools.name: hledger_rewrite
tools.description: Rewrite matching transactions by adding postings

tools.name: hledger_close
tools.description: Generate and optionally append closing/opening transactions

readOnly.title: Read-only mode
readOnly.description: If enabled, disables all write commands so access to your journals remains read-only.

skipBackup.title: Skip write backups
skipBackup.description: By default, all write commands create a backup of the journal before writing. If skip backup is enabled, no backup files will be created when writing to the journal files.

journalPath.title: Journal path
journalPath.description: The path to your main HLedger journal file.

hledgerExecutablePath.title: HLedger executable path
hledgerExecutablePath.description: Optional: Specify the full path to the hledger executable. If not set, the server will automatically detect hledger in common installation locations.

hledgerWebExecutablePath.title: HLedger web executable path
hledgerWebExecutablePath.description: Optional: Specify a dedicated executable for the hledger web interface (for example the hledger-web binary). If not set, the server runs `hledger web` using the primary executable.
